thought.text: Good! Now let me try to run a simple test to see if the environment works:

action.command:
cd /tmp/tmpl5smzkye/pytest && python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, 'src')
import subprocess
result = subprocess.run([sys.executable, '-m', 'pytest', '--help'], capture_output=True, text=True, cwd='.')
print('Return code:', result.returncode)
if result.returncode != 0:
    print('STDERR:', result.stderr[:500])
else:
    print('SUCCESS: pytest help works')
"
